name: 燃爆英雄(Bomb Hero)
description:
Bomb Hero is a leisure competitive game integrating elimination, MoBa, strategy and other elements. In Bomb Hero, you can control the hero to move to flip the ignition dice, push the dice to trigger the ignition rules, or release skills to ignite the ignition dice. The fire generated by dice explosion can not only ignite the same points or smaller dice, You can also attack enemy players through fire and gas injection. With novel damage methods and unique skill mechanism, all players can easily start to operate. With novel operation methods, you can create a new leisure competitive game



You can choose from a variety of game modes. In each play mode, you can choose single player experience or multi player matching experience

1. Energy war mode: ignite and detonate dice, collect energy and fill energy. You can win by filling 12 energy in 10 minutes. You can choose to form a team to cooperate and outwit your opponent, or you can choose to open happy single player mode to secretly tell you that killing enemy players can gain a lot of points and speed up energy acquisition, If the enemy player has energy, he can rob all the enemy's energy after killing

2. Peak duel mode: it requires a combination of high operations and high requirements for the release of skills. It needs to find a way to ignite and detonate the dice and blow up the enemy's defense tower. The crystal can win. It needs to prevent the enemy from making trouble and snatching the dice you ignite at all times

3. Guidance mode: as a novice player, you must not miss the tutorial. This mode can make you understand the rules faster, get familiar with the game, and make you ignite the dice faster and easier. There are many skills to flip the dice. I don't tell ordinary people



Whether you like to fight alone or work in a team, there is always a mode that can resonate with you and find a way to play that suits you

If you like to find teammates to fight together and use skills together to better feel the characteristics of heroes, you can choose 3v3, multi person matching, cooperative competition and skill matching

If you don't want to meet pit teammates, you can choose to fight alone and directly match the enemy players for one-on-one solo. You can perfectly show your personal operation and defeat each other. You don't have to worry about meeting pit teammates anymore

If you don't like fighting, you like to experience it alone, or you can enjoy the pleasure of ignition and detonation brought by turning dice quietly. When turning dice into a point, it detonates suddenly, which has a great pleasure. Are you looking forward to experiencing it



The new fighting rule of igniting dice. Players can't attack directly. They can only ignite the explosion by turning the dice to attack the enemy. The dice igniting rule is similar to the familiar elimination game. As long as the dice are turned to form dice with the same number of points, they can ignite. After a period of time, the ignited dice will explode, The fire and gas generated by exploding dice can ignite dice with the same number of points or smaller within the effective range



The new hero training system makes your favorite heroes more powerful. You can choose to train Qi Tian and the son of Vulcan who are good at detonating, Da Sima and Xiong Xianren who are good at igniting, or Taiyi and Lao Fu who help teammates



In the energy war mode, a new map will be randomly generated at the beginning of each game. The birth of dice is changeable in each game. You need to quickly eliminate dice, improve levels, upgrade skills and obtain energy according to the familiar ignition rules
